title: FG-88
summary: The FG-88 is a tier 3 automatic rifle that can be bought through Kavani faction terminals. It may only be obtained by obtaining the rank of Monitor in the Kavani Mandate.
full_text:
FG-88
The FG-88 is a tier 3 automatic rifle that can be bought through Kavani faction terminals. It may only be obtained by obtaining the rank of Monitor in the Kavani Mandate.

FG-88
The FG-88 was designed by Kavani engineers and continues to be the primary rifle used by its armed forces.
